revised_title: Finite Strains in Anisotropic Elastic Continua: A Thermodynamic Approach
tldr: This article presents a thermodynamic approach to study the finite strains in anisotropic elastic continua. The author derives the equations of state for an elastic solid deformed to a finite extent from an initial unstressed equilibrium configuration, making use of thermodynamic principles. The results apply to ideally elastic solids in general motion, and to non-ideally elastic solids when in equilibrium or subjected to changes only.
